snippet: Several of the Delegates who voted on the ticket nominated by a majority of the Anti-Rent Convention met this morning. Some were in favor of making out a ticket giving half to the Whigs and half to the Democrats. A large majority opposed it and it...
lead_paragraph: Several of the Delegates who voted on the ticket nominated by a majority of the Anti-Rent Convention met this morning. Some were in favor of making out a ticket giving half to the Whigs and half to the Democrats. A large majority opposed it and it was voted down.
